EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: Leasing and Billing User Training
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow User] Leasing and Billing User Training
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Leasing and Billing User Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(User.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'https://timbasurveys.ap2.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1j28000000ZytVAAS&uId=' + User.Id + '&case_id=' + Case.Id + '&wf=yes','https://timbasurveys.ap2.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1j28000000ZytVAAS&uId=' + User.Id + '&wf=yes'),'')}
